alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 3:58AM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult over Powder River and Granite mountain passes. The bitter cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility around a tenth of a mile in heaver snow could result in snowmobilers becoming disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
